Recognizer Options
  • Pan/Swipe

Pan

You can instantiate Pan with options and pass it to PointerListener.

Available options

Option Possible Values Simplified description
supportedDirections DIRECTION_ALL, DIRECTION_HORIZONTAL, DIRECTION_VERTICAL

or a list[] with one or more of the following:
DIRECTION_LEFT, DIRECTION_RIGHT, DIRECTION_UP, DIRECTION_DOWN 		DIRECTION_HORIZONTAL
or
[DIRECTION_LEFT, DIRECTION_RIGHT]
supported by:
